name: MHA Deku Simulator
description:
I have been watching a LOT of My Hero Academia lately and I remember the first episode where Izuku/Deku watches All Might and his computer and him banging his head became a meme, so I thought i'd make a project out of it.

Since on my scratch this has over 60 likes and faves and almost 1000 views, I decided to upload it to Itch and NewGrounds

NewGrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/847311

Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/590971145/
